This price reflects not only its market value but also the opportunity for you to enjoy its benefits at a reasonable cost. I trust you'll find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
